p: We compared the projected shifts in both the breeding and non-breeding ranges between the 2000 period and the 12 median projections for the future period (2070), for both short- and long-distance migrants. Using a circular ANOVA [ 34], we compared the direction of the shifts between breeding and non-breeding ranges, as well as between short- and long-distance migrants. We used t-tests to compare the distance of the shifts of breeding and non-breeding ranges between short- and long-distance migrants.
